kpi.name: M1034C11

kpi_info.title: RAB SETUP ATTEMPTS FOR CS VOICE PER OPER
kpi_info.use: "The number of RAB setup attempts for CS voice calls.This includes also incoming SRNC relocations, hard handovers and inter-system handovers. UPDATED: When the RNC receives an RANAP: RAB ASSIGNMENT REQUEST message, the purpose of which is to initate the establishment of a new CS voice RAB, or when the RNC receives RANAP: RELOCATION REQUEST."

kpi.kpi_alias: RAB SETUP ATTEMPTS FOR CS VOICE PER OPER
